name: Dark Sounds
description:
And you are here: in a room without exits around you, apparently without anyone inside. You Flashlight is the only thing that could help you, because you are not alone here. So dont give up! The Light will stop the Ghosts, and you have to hide. Don't do any noise, none. Escape from this room full of mysteries.

Recover the pieces of the lost puzzle and restore your Soul.
